explanation:
code_hardening: Added guards to return an empty array when the input string is null or empty, and to return a single-element array containing the original string when interval is 0. Marked parameters as final for additional safety.
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the method to stringSplitter and made it static to match its usage in Utils.centerText and avoid instance-based invocation issues.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Preserved the original chunking logic from the SO snippet, using a ceiling-based array length, fixed-size substrings, and placing any remainder in the last element, applied only after input validation.
refactoring: Converted the method from an instance method to a static utility-style method and aligned the name with project conventions.
misc: Added a brief inline comment clarifying the handling of the final remainder substring; no new custom API calls were introduced.
